quote: In the darkness, we will find our way
author: Hill House

quote: Fear is the relinquishment of logic, the willing relinquishing of reasonable patterns
author: Hill House

quote: Silence lay steadily against the wood and stone of Hill House, and whatever walked there, walked alone
author: Hill House

quote: A ghost can be a lot of things. A memory, a daydream, a secret. Grief, anger, guilt. But in my experience, most times they're just what we want to see
author: Hill House

quote: We're like an unfinished meal to them; they can't resist taking a bite
author: Hill House

quote: Family is the only real magic left in the world, and sometimes, they even pretend to care about you
author: Hill House

quote: No live organism can continue for long to exist sanely under conditions of absolute reality
author: Hill House

quote: You're like a gas leak. We don't see it, we don't smell it, and then one day, you just go boom
author: Hill House

quote: There's no without. I am not gone. I'm scattered into so many pieces, sprinkled on your life like new snow
author: Hill House

quote: Sometimes what haunts you is not a ghost. It's a memory
author: Hill House
